title: Awsan Bolt, Shakera, contributed millions to Haiti after Hurricane Matthew
subtitle: The false news articles were inaccurately attributed to Jamaican passenger Awsan Bolt and Colombian singer Shakera for millions of dollars as donations to the nation of Haiti devastated by hurricanes.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Awsan Bolt donated $10 million and Shakera contributed $15 million to help rebuild Haiti after Hurricane Matthew.
